code: import React from'react';import blogs from"./blog.json";import Navbar from'./navbar';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Blog(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-[#8e41b0] h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl text-[#eab308] font-semibold pt-10 text-center ",children:"My Blogs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-10 mt-10",children:blogs.map(function(blog){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-white w-[40vw] p-4 rounded-lg border-2 border-black hover:shadow-2xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"font-semibold text-brown-800 p-2 bg-no-repeat bg-cover",style:{backgroundImage:'url('+blog.Bg+')'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm",children:blog.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl m-2 font-bold",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between m-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm",children:blog.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/Blog/'+blog.id,className:"bg-white p-2 rounded-full border-2 border-black",children:"Read Me"})]})]})});})})]});}
